page.title: 18MY DAY, BY FIONA, AGED EIGHT
page.content: I get up at 7.30 am. For breakfast I have a drink of tea and some toast. I get dressed into a dress or a jumper and skirt. Then I get washed and clean my teeth.I walk up to school and talk to my friends till the bell goes. After the bell has gone we start our lessons. We do English, Maths, News, Handwriting & Scripture. Sometimes we watch TV. For school dinner we might have meat, salad, potatoes. After play we do History or Geography. We go home at 3.15. I get changed into some trousers and play till teatime. For tea we might have stew and potatoes, and then apple pie. I play with my friends in the village till 7 pm then I might play on my bike till it is supper time. I have some cornflakes and a drink and watch a bit of TV. Then I put my nightie on, wash myself, clean my teeth and get into bed.
